item.title: Predicting Stock Price using Recurrent Neural Network
item.description: Prelude Brownian Motion stats that the future variations of the stock price are independent from the past. So it is actually impossible to predict the future stock price but one thing we can do or predict is the trend. So in the tutorial we will try to predict the upward and downward trend on Google Stock Price using LSTM Going about We will try to get a better understand on the usage of LSTMs.
